title: Жизнь: забесплатно
overview: Is it possible to eat delicacies absolutely free? Live in a metropolis without money? Not spend a penny on a place to stay? And still earn money? Of course, it is possible! And this will be proven by the program "Life: for free". Ivan Makarevich and Vasilisa Khvostova will go through a real consumer quest with empty pockets. And all this in order to show the viewers of the program "Life: for free" how fun it is to live and not pay for anything!
